description: Jessica Steinhauser, better known as Asia Carrera, has avoided jail time stemming from her 2015 arrest on a drunken-driving charge with her 10-year-old daughter in the car.
title: Utah porn star and 'Pastafarian' Asia Carrer sentenced to house arrest for DUI
title_page: Utah porn star and 'Pastafarian' Asia Carrer sentenced to house arrest for DUI | Daily Mail Online
text:
Asia Carrera's days of wearing a colander on her head in public are now behind her - at least for the immediate future.
The former Utah porn actress who made headlines in 2014 when she donned a pasta strainer for her driver’s license photo, will serve house arrest for a DUI charge.
Carrera, whose real name is Jessica Steinhauser, pleaded no contest last Thursday in exchange for avoiding jail time.
Former porn actress Jessica Steinhauser (left and right), 42, better known as Asia Carrera, has been sentenced to house arrest in connection to a March 2015 DUI arrest
Unforgettable picture: Steinhauser made headlines in 2014 when she was photographed for her driver's license wearing a pasta strainer
The 42-year-old mother of two, who appeared in adult films as Asia Carrera but has since changed her name to 'Asia Lemmon,' was arrested in March 2015 when she was found passed out on a couch at the Washington County School District’s office where she had taken her daughter for academic testing.
Defense attorney Douglas Terry told the newspaper The Spectrum last week that Steinhauser has a special-needs child and has been proactive about getting counselling for her problem.
Steinhauser’s plea came one day before she was set to go on trial on a single misdemeanor DUI count carrying up to a year in jail.
Mom: Steinhauser was arrested in March 2015 when she was found passed out on a couch at the Washington County School District’s office where she had taken her daughter (left) for academic testing
Bombshell: The 42-year-old worked in the porn industry from 1994 to 2005, starring in more than 260 adult films and videos
Non-believer: The ex-porn legend is a self-proclaimed atheist and was the fourth person in the US to be photographed for her license with a pasta strainer on her head
According to a probable cause stemming from Steinhauser's March 5 arrest, staff at the Washington County School District Office found the mother-of-two asleep on a couch and called police.
St. George police officers who responded to the scene detected the odor of alcohol on her breath.
When Steinhauser tried to leave the office, officers conducted field sobriety tests, which she failed, followed by a Breathalyzer test.
The device recorded her blood alcohol content level at .254 per cent – three times the legal limit in Utah.
Steinhauser, a native of New York City, attended Rutgers University in New Jersey and played classical piano at Carnegie Hall, according to her biography. She is also a member of the MENSA high-IQ society.
The 42-year-old worked in the porn industry from 1994 to 2005, starring in more than 260 adult films and videos.
Steinhauser attended Rutgers University in New Jersey and played classical piano at Carnegie Hall. She is a also member of the MENSA high-IQ society
The Utah resident has two children - a son and daughter. Her Facebook profile says she is a widow
Her movies include titles like Let's Play Doctor, Planet of the Babes, Sexual Misconduct, Wild Wild Chest and Superboobs.
The ex-porn legend is a self-proclaimed atheist and was the fourth person in the US to be photographed for her license with a pasta strainer on her head, saying she was part of the satirical Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster.
Members of the so-called church, sometimes called 'Pastafarians', have decided the colander is their official headgear.
After taking the photo, she said: 'I'm a really proud, outspoken atheist.
'I am proud of Utah for allowing freedom of all religions in what is considered by many to be a one-religion state.'
